translation.en: Historically, when we look at evolution...
translation.zh: 从历史发展角度看进化论…

translation.en: ...it's not surprising that Chappie's left turn happened.
translation.zh: 就不会惊讶于查派的意外了 （南森·史密斯 纽约《前哨报》记者）

translation.en: It's too early to tell how this is all going to play out.
translation.zh: 要说故事会怎么发生还为时过早

translation.en: I didn't believe this would happen in my lifetime, but it is.
translation.zh: 我不敢相信这事会发生在 我的生活中，但它就是发生了 （威廉·罗伯茨 麻省大学认知学专家）

translation.en: Each day, more than 300 murders and violent attacks take place here.
translation.zh: 每一天，超过三百起谋杀 和暴力袭击事件在这里上演

translation.en: Two officers have been killed, three taken to the hospital.
translation.zh: 两名警察被杀，三名受伤被送往医院

translation.en: A bloody end to a shoot-out between cops and robbers.
translation.zh: 一场警察与劫匪的枪战以血腥结尾

translation.en: Today, we usher in a new day.
translation.zh: 今天，我们迎来新的一天

translation.en: -One that represents the end of crime. -Move in. Lock on target. Fire! Fire!
translation.zh: -这一天代表着犯罪的终结 -前进，锁定目标，开火！开火！

translation.en: Go! Go! Up against the wall!

translation.zh: -目标全部被终结 -而且这是我们城市…

translation.en: Welcome to the world's first robotic police force.
translation.zh: 让我们掌声欢迎世界上 第一支机器警察队伍

translation.en: Johannesburg, South Africa, became the focus of the world in 2016...
translation.zh: 随着地球上第一支 纯机器警察部门的发展…

translation.en: ...with the deployment of the planet's first all-robotic police units.
translation.zh: 南非约翰内斯堡在2016年 成为了世界的焦点

translation.en: Crime levels plummeted, and Tetravaal stock skyrocketed.
translation.zh: （泰特拉瓦尔公司） 犯罪率直线下落 泰特拉瓦尔公司股票疯涨

translation.en: Certain parts are from China, but all robots are assembled right here in South Africa.
translation.zh: （米歇尔·布莱德利 泰特拉瓦尔公司首席执行官） 部分零件产自中国，但所有机器人 都在南非这里组装

translation.en: The population's biggest fear was vulnerability to hacking.
translation.zh: 过去人们最恐怖的莫过于碰到黑客

translation.en: Tetravaal assures this is not something to worry about...
translation.zh: 泰特拉瓦尔公司向您保证 有了机器警察的密钥系统…

translation.en: A system which allows only them to update software on the robots.
translation.zh: 这个系统只允许公司员工 更新机器人身上安装的程序

translation.en: Before the success of the ubiquitous human-sized police robots...
translation.zh: 在这些真人大小的机器警察 成功普及开来之前…

translation.en: ...there was a bigger bad boy on the block: the Moose.
translation.zh: 还有一个更强劲的悍将：麋鹿

translation.en: Vincent Moore is a weapons designer and a former soldier.
translation.zh: 文森特·摩尔是名武器制造师 曾经是名士兵

translation.en: He has a spiritual issue with artificial intelligence.
translation.zh: 他对人工智能十分狂热

translation.en: I have a robot that is indestructible.
translation.zh: 我有个坚不可摧的机器人

translation.en: It is operated by a thinking, adaptable...
translation.zh: （文森特·摩尔 麋鹿系列的首席开发员） 由一名能够思考、应变力强…

translation.en: ...the human operator's thoughts into the robot's actions.
translation.zh: 将人类操控员的所思所想 转换为机器人的动作

translation.en: A departure from the AI that governs the Scouts.
translation.zh: 人工智能理念管理着侦察兵

translation.en: Now with interest from the U.S., China and North Korea...
translation.zh: 美国、中国和北朝鲜 都对此表现出浓厚的兴趣…

translation.en: ...the Scouts' creator, Deon Wilson, sees a rich future.
translation.zh: 侦察兵系列的创始人，迪恩·威尔森 看到了无比广阔的前景

translation.en: What really interests me is high-level AI.
translation.zh: 真正引起我兴趣的是高级人工智能 （迪恩·威尔森 侦察兵系列的首席开发员）

translation.en: True intelligence. A machine that can think and feel.
translation.zh: 这是真正的智能 一个能够思考、有感觉的机器

translation.en: Is that the mandate at Tetravaal?
translation.zh: 这是泰特拉瓦尔公司授权的吗？

translation.en: To take that evolutionary step forward and build something truly alive?
translation.zh: 踏出这样革命性的一步 创造出新的生命？

translation.en: Scout 22 arriving now at Maintenance Bay 6.
translation.zh: 侦察兵22号现在到达6号维护仓

translation.en: -Team 1, off deck. Go! -Hurry. Open it up.
translation.zh: -一队，准备好行动！ -快点，打开它

translation.en: See this 22? Luck of the draw.
translation.zh: 看见这个22号了吗？真是倒霉

translation.en: They used him as a speed bump.
Look at this. It's like he's cursed or something.
translation.zh: 看看这个，感觉就像他被诅咒了什么的

translation.en: Every time he goes out. Now, yeah, it's his ear.
translation.zh: 每回他一出来 好了，是他的耳朵

translation.en: Antenna, right. Can we switch this out?
translation.zh: 天线，对 我们能换成新的吗？

translation.en: Reports of gunfire in Sections 5, 7 and 8.
translation.zh: 关于第五、七、八区枪击案的报道

translation.en: Police request all available Scouts to be mobilized.
translation.zh: 警方要求调用 所有可用的侦察兵机器人

translation.en: Hey, 22, just watch yourself this time, eh?
-We're in shit! -Duh, we in shit, Amerika!
translation.zh: -我们有麻烦了！ -嗯，我们有麻烦了，亚美利加！

translation.en: I said it was a bad deal.
translation.zh: 我说了这不是个好买卖

translation.en: -I said it over and over. -Everybody, just chill!
translation.zh: -我说了一遍又一遍 -所有人，安静！

translation.en: Yes, we have a problem. And, yes, I'm gonna solve it!
translation.zh: 是，我们遇到麻烦了 对，我要解决它！

translation.en: Command, we are searching for suspects driving a gray vehicle.
translation.zh: 指挥部，我们在搜寻开着一辆 灰色汽车的嫌疑人
-他们搞什么鬼？ -看起来很生气的样子

translation.en: We're lucky to be alive, Hippo.
translation.zh: 希波，我们能活下来已经很幸运了

translation.en: You know there's no way out of this.
There's always a way. Name your price. We'll sort you out.
translation.zh: 总有办法的，说说你要多少钱 我们会想办法的
-别胡扯了老兄，这太荒谬了 -你他妈干什么？

translation.en: Fuck I'm gonna pay that back, dude?
translation.zh: 我去哪里弄这么多钱，老兄？

translation.en: -Now, get on your fucking knees! -Okay, okay, okay.
translation.zh: -现在，快他妈跪下！ -好的、好的、好的

translation.en: -Get behind the wall! -Yo-Landi, get in the van.
Can't get a clear shot. Touching down.
-Who took the keys? -You gave it to that guy!
translation.zh: -谁拿着钥匙？ -你交给那个家伙了！

translation.en: Human officers are on the ground.
Drop your weapons. You are under arrest.
Come on. Where are the keys?
Hey, poes! I need my keys, please!
translation.zh: 嘿，老兄！拜托，我需要钥匙！

translation.en: -Drop your weapon. Drop your weapon! -Fuck you!
translation.zh: -放下武器，放下武器！ -去你妈的！

translation.en: Shit! They hit the rotor. We need to touch down.
translation.zh: 该死！他们打中了旋翼 我们必须着陆
收到，我们马上派出机器人

translation.en: -Amerika! Amerika! I've got the keys! -Your keys.
translation.zh: -亚美利加！我找到钥匙了！ -你的钥匙

translation.en: -Hey, Landi, he's got the keys! -Let's go!
translation.zh: -嘿，尤兰蒂，他找到钥匙了！ -我们走！

translation.en: -Are you okay? -I'm not okay! I'm hit!
Yet another victory for the robotic police force.
translation.zh: 机器人警察部队的又一次胜利

translation.en: This marks the 30th large-scale crime ring smashed this year.
translation.zh: 这是今年粉碎的第三十个 大型犯罪团伙

translation.en: ...if I may have your attention, please.
The police chief just called me...
...to place an order for another 100 Scouts.
translation.zh: 预定了另外一百台侦察兵

translation.en: This is very, very good news.
translation.zh: 这是个非常、非常棒的消息

translation.en: -I couldn't have done it without you. -I know.
translation.zh: -没有你我不可能做到 -我知道
-祝贺你，老兄，你真了不起 -干得漂亮，伙计！

translation.en: Is this the "I feel sorry for Vincent" call?
translation.zh: 这是"我为文森可惜"的电话吗？
-别担心，文斯 -我还真有点担心

translation.en: ...we have one more stab with the police.
Try to get those costs down.

translation.zh: -别灰心 -当你不停削减我的资金时…

translation.en: ...when you keep cutting my funding. Twenty percent this year, 25 last year.
translation.zh: 今年削减了20%，去年是25% 我很难做到这一点

translation.en: I've got work to do on the Moose.
translation.zh: 我的麋鹿系列还需要研制资金呢

translation.en: The threat detection is still in its elemental phase.
translation.zh: 威胁侦测仍在初级阶段

translation.en: Threat detection is superfluous. The operator detects the threat.
translation.zh: 威胁侦测系统是多余的 操控员能够检测到危险

translation.en: Then we send the Moose out.
translation.zh: 然后我们再让麋鹿机器人出动

translation.en: -Deon Wilson to the workshop. -I need to go. I'll talk to you in a bit.
translation.zh: -迪恩·威尔森，请到车间来 -我要走了，一会儿再聊

translation.en: It's my little boy in again, eh?
translation.zh: 我的小男孩又进来了，嗯？

translation.en: Fucking surprise, surprise. Every time. He's a bullet magnet.
translation.zh: 真他妈奇怪，每次都是他 他就是块吸引子弹的磁铁

translation.en: -What's going on, guys? -Here's the report. It's 22. Again.
translation.zh: -伙计们，怎么了？ -这是报告，那是22号，又被击中

translation.en: See a lot of the internals got damaged.
translation.zh: 看，内部许多元件都损坏了

translation.en: -Brain architecture's still intact. -Regardless, it's a write-off.
translation.zh: -大脑结构仍未受损 -无所谓，它完全损毁了

translation.en: -Okay, let's salvage the CPU. -We could try to cut the battery out.
translation.zh: -好，那就把中央处理器拿出来吧 -我们可以尝试把电池分离出来

translation.en: -It's still charged, still stable. -No, not worth the effort.
translation.zh: -电池正常，还挺稳定的 -不，这不值得再费功夫

translation.en: Droid 22 written off. Crush the chassis and recycle the alloys. Yeah?
translation.zh: 销毁22号机器人，粉碎框架 回收合金，行吧？

translation.en: Come, come, come. Into the lair.
-Careful, man. -We need to stitch his shit up.
translation.zh: -小心，老兄 -我们要给他缝合一下

translation.en: No, I didn't think that, Hippo.
You think you don't owe me this money anymore?
translation.zh: 你认为你不欠我这笔钱了？

translation.en: Because you think I'm in prison or what?
translation.zh: 因为你认为我进监狱了什么的？
我们把你的钱准备好的

translation.en: Maybe I come to your secret place in Soweto.
translation.zh: 也许我会到你在索韦托的秘密基地

translation.en: I come there with the fellows.
We got a week to come up with his money.
translation.zh: 我们有一个星期的时间 把钱还给他

translation.en: How are we gonna do that? Come on, that's ridiculous.
translation.zh: 我们要怎么还？ 拜托，这简直不可能

translation.en: We pay that animal. We pocket the rest.
translation.zh: 把钱还给那个禽兽 剩下的归我们

translation.en: And we get out while we still can. Boom.
translation.zh: 然后趁我们还能出去的时候离开 我们就发达了

translation.en: What are you getting on about, a bank job?
translation.zh: 怎么去弄这笔钱，抢银行吗？

translation.en: The droids are gonna come down on our asses, okay?
translation.zh: 那些机器人会来抓我们的，好吗？
-他们会把我们一网打尽 -没错

translation.en: Guys, we need, like, a remote.
translation.zh: 伙计们，我们需要，一个遥控器
-就像一个开关 -什么？再说一遍？

translation.en: Okay, the robots are like machines, right?
translation.zh: 这些机器人就是一堆机器 对吗？

translation.en: So if we had a remote to switch it off....
translation.zh: 如果我们有个遥控器能关掉它…

translation.en: We need to find the guy who makes the robots and steal his remotes.
translation.zh: 我们要找到那个制作机器人的家伙 然后盗取他的遥控器

translation.en: -Have you been a good boy today? -Yes, Deon.
-Yeah? Did you clean my room? -Your room has been sterilized.
translation.zh: -哦？你打扫了我的房间？ -你的房间已经消过毒了

translation.en: Are you working on your artificial intelligence program tonight?
translation.zh: 今晚要继续你的人工智能计划吗？
现在我已经很接近成功了

translation.en: There's always chance of error, I'm aware of this.
translation.zh: 总是有些误差，我已经注意到了

translation.en: But statistically speaking, I think I might be on track.
translation.zh: 但从数据上看，我想我走上正轨了

translation.en: I have several terabytes of compiling and coding to do...
translation.zh: 我有几太字节的编译和解码工作要做…

translation.en: All right? See you in a bit.
Dude, it's gonna be so easy.
We need those remotes, my man.
translation.zh: 老兄，我们需要那些遥控器
我想我攻克了这个难题

translation.en: Of course, to really know, I must test it on a live system.
translation.zh: 当然，要得到真实数据 我必须在一个真实系统中做试验

translation.en: -Hey. Where's the Scout? -How's it, sir? What?
translation.zh: -嘿，侦察兵在哪？ -怎么回事？什么？

translation.en: -The Scout, man, 22 for demolition. -Guys are prepping the compactor.
translation.zh: -侦察兵，老兄，销毁的22号 -他们正在准备捣碎机
-22号马上就要被捣碎了 -谢天谢地

translation.en: Just wait for me, but don't destroy it, okay?
translation.zh: 等我一下，但是别销毁它，好吗？

translation.en: -What are you proposing now? -Ma'am, I think I've cracked it.
translation.zh: -你现在想说什么？ -女士，我破解了这个难题

translation.en: The world's first proper, full artificial intelligence.
translation.zh: 世界上第一个特有的 全面的人工智能

translation.en: This is a computer system that might be smarter than a human.
translation.zh: 这是个可能比人类更聪明的计算机系统

translation.en: I could show it a piece of art...
translation.zh: 我向它展示一件艺术品…

translation.en: ...and this thing, this being, could judge that art.
translation.zh: 这个东西可以辨别出艺术成分

translation.en: It could decide if it liked it.
translation.zh: 它能判断它是否喜欢这件艺术品

translation.en: It could write music and poetry.
Do you realize you just came...
translation.zh: 你没发现你刚刚来到一位…

translation.en: ...to the CEO of a publicly traded weapons corporation...
translation.zh: 武器销售公司的首席执行官面前…

translation.en: ...and pitched a robot that can write poems?
translation.zh: 推荐一个能作诗的机器人？

translation.en: Well, if you just let me explain--
translation.zh: 只要你给我个解释的机会…

translation.en: Deon, Tetravaal is very happy with you.
translation.zh: 迪恩，泰特拉瓦尔公司 很高兴有你的加入

translation.en: The Scouts are a huge success.
translation.zh: 侦察兵系列是巨大的成功

translation.en: Ma'am, look, it won't cost you anything.
translation.zh: 女士，听我说 这不会耗费你任何钱

translation.en: A droid downstairs was written off yesterday, smashed beyond repair.
translation.zh: 楼下有个机器人昨天被清除了数据 无法修理只能被销毁

translation.en: Let me install this on it.
translation.zh: 让我把程序安装到这个机器人上

translation.en: -Please just let me test it. -No. No, I'm sorry, Deon.
translation.zh: -求求你，只是让我做个试验 -不，不行，很抱歉，迪恩

translation.en: You know how insurance works for those...
translation.zh: 你知道保险公司有多难搞…

translation.en: ...all the red tape and the paperwork.
translation.zh: 那些繁琐的程序和文件工作

translation.en: All new employees, please report to Human Resources for orientation.
translation.zh: 所有新员工，请到人力资源部 进行情况汇报

translation.en: Remember to have your security pass visible at all times.
translation.zh: 记得随身携带你的安全通行证

translation.en: Hey. Can you give me a hand over here?
This is you getting hijacked, my friend.
And these are all part of what makes the Moose unique...
translation.zh: 就是这些让麋鹿系列独一无二…

translation.en: ...and perfect for you at the department.
translation.zh: 很适合在警局工作的你们

translation.en: The strategic ability to neutralize the enemy's targets.
translation.zh: 能够消灭敌人目标物的战略能力

translation.en: We're taking out an enemy's aircraft?
We are talking about urban crimes here?
translation.zh: 消灭城市犯罪需要这么大动干戈吗？
你知道，抢劫、劫车、街头滞留

translation.en: I'm talking all kinds of targets, sir. Low to high.
translation.zh: 先生，我能解决所有目标 由低到高

translation.en: I do believe you need a weapons platform...
translation.zh: 我确信你需要一个武器平台…

translation.en: ...that can fire warheads with precision and reliability.
translation.zh: 能够准确可靠地发射弹头

translation.en: And might I add, sir, all under the control of a human operator.
translation.zh: 而且，请允许我追加一句 所有这些都由人类操作员操控

translation.en: ...the police force is very happy with the Scouts. Very, very happy.
translation.zh: 警方对侦察兵系列非常满意 非常、非常满意
-我们刚刚预订了新的机器人 -谢谢

translation.en: We've been very successful at bringing down crime.
translation.zh: 我们成功降低了犯罪率

translation.en: But this? No, we don't want this.
translation.zh: 但是这个？不，我们不想要这个

translation.en: I mean, look at it. It's overkill. It's expensive, it's big, and it's ugly.
translation.zh: 我是说，看看这个，杀伤力太大 价格昂贵，又大又丑

translation.en: It'll have to get a hell of a lot worse for us to even consider this.
translation.zh: 想想就知道 这会给我们制造很多麻烦

translation.en: A hell of a lot worse.
No, I think we're done here.

translation.zh: 我们会将那些侦察兵交给你

translation.en: Please. Please, I don't have much money.
translation.zh: 求你了，求你了，我没多少钱

translation.en: Shut up. I don't want your money.
-We know who you are, my friend. -We know you make the robots.
translation.zh: -我们知道你是谁，我的朋友 -我们知道你会制造机器人

translation.en: No, there must be a mistake.
We know you have some kind of TV remote thing to switch those robots off.
translation.zh: 我们知道你有电视遥控器之类的东西 能关掉那些机器人

translation.en: -Maybe there's one in the van. -Ja, check the van.
translation.zh: -也许车里有一个 -去，搜他的车

translation.en: -Cut his feet off. -That's a good idea, Amerika.
translation.zh: -砍掉他的脚 -好主意，亚美利加

translation.en: -No, no, no! No, please! Help! -Yo, man, that's a good idea.
translation.zh: -不！不，求你了！救命！ -兄弟，好主意

translation.en: You can get yourself a nice, funky wheelchair.
translation.zh: 你可以买个漂亮时髦的轮椅给自己

translation.en: No, please listen. You cannot switch them off.
translation.zh: 不，请听我说，你不可能关掉它们

translation.en: They have a firmware lock. They're always on.
translation.zh: 它们安装了固件锁，常设是开启
求求你！求你，别这么做！不！

translation.en: He managed to turn this one off.
There's legs and shit all over the place. Was he gonna build it or something?
translation.zh: 这里到处是机械腿之类的零件 他要修理好这个还是什么？

translation.en: What if we get him to program this bad boy to fight for us?
translation.zh: 干脆我们给这台机器编程 让它替我们而战如何？

translation.en: Like an indestructible robot gangsta, number one, son.
translation.zh: 就像一个超级无敌的 一号黑帮机器人

translation.en: Listen, my friend, we know about your little buddy...
translation.zh: 听着，我的朋友 我们知道你在车里…

translation.en: Either you reprogram that robot in the van to work for us...
translation.zh: 要不你把车里的那个机器人重置 让它为我们工作…

translation.en: ...or we fucking shoot you right now.
translation.zh: 要不我们立马开枪打死你

translation.en: -Don't play dumb! -You know exactly what we mean.
translation.zh: -别装傻！ -我们的意思你很清楚

translation.en: Turn that robot into the illest gangsta on the block.
translation.zh: 把那个机器人变成 世上最邪恶的歹徒

translation.en: We use him to make some moves and make some real money.
translation.zh: 我们用他做些事，赚大钱

translation.en: The one in my van is a test.
translation.zh: 我车上的那个是试验品

translation.en: It's never been tried, but if it works, you can...
translation.zh: 从没试用过，但如果成了，你可以…

translation.en: ...train him to do what you want.
What do you mean, "if it works"?
It's a new project I'm working on.
translation.zh: 这是我在做的一个新项目

translation.en: It makes the robot have a mind like a human.
translation.zh: 让机器人像人类一样思考

translation.en: But it's like a child in the beginning.
translation.zh: 但开始就像懵懂无知的孩子

translation.en: Like a human baby, but smarter.
Its AI can learn much faster than any organic intelligence.
translation.zh: 这种人工智能比任何有机智慧生物 学得都快的多

translation.en: -But it has to be taught. -Well, for how long?
This is your only option! I'm telling you:
translation.zh: 这是你唯一的选择！我告诉你：

translation.en: You cannot switch them off and you cannot hack the others.
translation.zh: 你不能关掉它们 也不能黑掉其他机器人

translation.en: It's just plug and play. Quick release. Snap on and snap off.
translation.zh: 只是插上电源，打开开关 快速释放程序，开启、关闭

translation.en: -Why is all its legs off? -It was scheduled for destruction.
translation.zh: -为什么它的四肢都被拆了？ -它本来应被销毁的

translation.en: The battery's fused with the chassis.
translation.zh: 电池和框架熔接在一起

translation.en: -It means you can't change the battery. -How long will it last?
translation.zh: -意思是你不能换电池 -电池能用多久？

translation.en: About five days, until the battery dies.
translation.zh: 电池用完之前还能用大概五天

translation.en: -This thing will only run for five days? -Roughly, yes.
translation.zh: -这玩意只能再用五天？ -大概是的

translation.en: A Guard Key. You need it to install new software.
translation.zh: 密钥，你需要这个来 安装新的软件

translation.en: Remember I said it has to learn?
translation.zh: 记得我说过它要学习吗？

translation.en: I have to come back and help to teach it.
translation.zh: 我必须回来，帮忙教育它

translation.en: Switch the thing on now, my friend.
translation.zh: 现在打开这玩意，我的朋友

translation.en: Give it space. Give it space.
Please, please, please. Put the gun down.
translation.zh: 拜托，求你，求求你，放下枪

translation.en: Hey, come here. Come here, little buddy.
translation.zh: 嘿，过来这里，到这里来，小家伙

translation.en: Please! It doesn't understand English yet. It doesn't understand you.
translation.zh: 求你！它还不懂英语，不懂你在说什么

translation.en: You gave me a retarded robot?
translation.zh: 你给了我个弱智机器人？

translation.en: Ninjie-kun, just go in the kitchen. I've got this.
I'll get it. Just go get a beer or something.
translation.zh: 你去喝杯一瓶啤酒吧，我来就好

translation.en: Can he understand me when I speak?
Come. No one's gonna hurt you.
I know you don't understand, but it's okay.
translation.zh: 我知道你不懂，但没关系

translation.en: I'm just gonna get one more thing.
What's this? Hey, look at this.

translation.zh: 就是这个，这就是你的名字 "查派"

translation.en: No. No, no, no. No, his name is not--
Wait! Wait! I need to get the Guard Key out of his head.
translation.zh: 等等！等等！我需要把密钥 从他头上拔下来

translation.en: -I'll orient you if I ever see you again. -He's mine! He's special.
translation.zh: -下次见面时再让你调适 -他是我的！他是特殊的

translation.en: I don't want any confrontation, okay? I'll see him tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我不想有任何对峙，好吗？ 明天我会来见他

translation.en: You made an agreement. Let him train the robot.
translation.zh: 你同意了，让他训练这个机器人

translation.en: Let me come and see him like we agreed. Please.
translation.zh: 我们达成共识了 让我过来看他，求你们了

translation.en: What the hell are you up to, Deon?
What the hell is this? Open.
And the Masters of the Universe!
...prince of Eternia and defender of the secrets of Castle Grayskull.
translation.zh: 是埃坦尼亚王国的王子 我保守着辉克堡的秘密

translation.en: Fabulous secret powers were revealed to me...
translation.zh: 我可以为自己召来神秘的魔力…

translation.en: ...the day I held aloft my magic sword and said:
You stay under this roof, you make money for me.
translation.zh: 你住在这个屋里 就得我赚钱

translation.en: The first thing you do is you get your gun.
translation.zh: 你做的第一件事 就是你得到你的枪

translation.en: Then you cock your gun. Now it's ready to shoot, nè?
translation.zh: 然后你竖起枪 现在准备好射击，如何？

translation.en: I wanna shoot that blue bottle, there in the front.
translation.zh: 我想打那个蓝瓶子 前面那里

translation.en: Have a look. Nice and easy.
So I aim at the blue bottle, like, there it is. I'm like, "Okay, and--"
translation.zh: 那么我瞄准蓝瓶子 比如那边那个，我说"好的…"

translation.en: Now I'm gonna shoot the green bottle. Okay, look, I aim and pow! See?
translation.zh: 现在我要打绿瓶子 好，看着，瞄准，砰！看到了？

translation.en: Now I'm gonna shoot the yellow one.
Come here. Come here. Stand here. Now, listen, take the gun.
translation.zh: 过来，过来，站这儿 听着，拿着枪

translation.en: Hold the gun proper-- Just straighten your arm.
translation.zh: 正确握枪… 挺直胳膊

translation.en: Just hold the fucking gun properly, Chappie.
You fucked up my sight. This shit's expensive.
translation.zh: 你弄坏了我的瞄准镜 这个东西很贵的

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Teaching him to shoot.
You shouldn't be doing this shit with him yet.
Deon said he has to be orientated first.
Okay, you know what? I'm gonna go and get the weed on my own.
translation.zh: 好，你知道吗？ 我要亲自去找大麻

translation.en: And I'm gonna make all the money...
...so we can buy the explosives to do this heist.
translation.zh: 这样我们就可以买炸药实施抢劫

translation.en: He's not stupid. He's just a kid.
Go do your nails and play with your titanium baby!
translation.zh: 去做个指甲 然后和你的钛合金宝贝玩去吧！

translation.en: Still a baby yourself, aren't you? Whoa, hey. What happened, man?
translation.zh: 你自己还是个孩子，不是吗？ 嘿，发生什么事了？

translation.en: Jeez. You got a little bit rowdy at the bar with your mates?
translation.zh: 老天，你是不是在酒吧 打架打输了？

translation.en: If you ever wanna come out with me, go hit the heavy bag at the gym...
translation.zh: 如果你想跟我出来 去健身房打打沙袋…

translation.en: ...we could nut out a few great moves.
Always gotta be ready. You know what I'm saying?
translation.zh: 时刻要做好准备 你知道我在说什么吧？

translation.en: -Want in? -Thanks for the offer, but I'm good.
It's real cool, man. It's really cool.
Hey, listen, bit of a favor.
Just wanted to borrow the Guard Key...
...so I can check Scout security levels with my design.
translation.zh: 我就能用我的设计 检查一下侦察兵的安全级别

translation.en: I just wanna make sure that the Moose is as secure as the Scouts.
translation.zh: 我只想确保麋鹿系列像侦察兵一样安全

translation.en: Michelle asked me to check on the security, so....
translation.zh: 米歇尔让我查查安全性，所以…

translation.en: Yeah, just an hour or something.
Vincent, you know I can't do that, right?
translation.zh: 文森特 你知道我不能那么做，对吧？

translation.en: Mate, don't be such a wowser.
One engineer to another, asking for the Guard Key.
translation.zh: 一个工程师向另一个要密钥
-听着，我只是在开玩笑 -太好笑了，嗯

translation.en: You'd have to tell the Board of--
I spent two years at DARPA, you whacker.
translation.zh: 你这个吹牛大王 我在国防部高级研究计划局待了两年

translation.en: And, yeah, I was SASR, you little stickybeak.
translation.zh: 嗯，我曾在特种空勤团 你这个爱管闲事的家伙

translation.en: You're making me as cross as a frog in a sock, mate.
Your robots have drained all my funding.
translation.zh: 你的机器人把我的资金全耗尽了

translation.en: You're a big problem for me, you get me?
translation.zh: 你对我来说是个大麻烦 你明白吧？

translation.en: So I'm gonna start asking you slowly, you dipstick.
translation.zh: 所以我要开始慢慢问你 你这个笨蛋

translation.en: As if I'd carry live rounds here.
translation.zh: 我才不会真枪实弹地来上班呢

translation.en: It's a prank. Everyone go back to work, man. Come on.
translation.zh: 恶作剧 大家都回去工作，快点

translation.en: Any Sunday, mate, you're welcome. Come with me.
translation.zh: 任何一个周日都欢迎你来 跟我来

translation.en: To all of you. All welcome.
translation.zh: 对你们所有人都是，都欢迎

translation.en: This office has gotta lighten up.
translation.zh: 这间办公室需要放松一下

translation.en: Where are you going, mate? Where are you going?
translation.zh: 伙计，你要去哪儿？ 你要去哪儿？

translation.en: Wait, wait. Chappie, look. Look. Look.
translation.zh: 等等，查派，你看 你看，你看

translation.en: No, he's stupid. He can't talk. We're screwed.
translation.zh: 不，他很傻 他不会说话，我们完蛋了

translation.en: No, he can talk. He's smart.
No, he can talk. He's smart.
-Oh, my God. Look, he's copying me! -Oh, my God. Look, he's copying me!
translation.zh: -哦，天哪，看，他在学我！ -哦，天哪，看，他在学我！

translation.en: That homes is a clever little robot.
translation.zh: 这位兄弟是个聪明的小机器人

translation.en: That homes is a clever little robot right there.
translation.zh: 这位兄弟是个聪明的小机器人

translation.en: -This motherfucker talks ghetto. -This fuck mother talks ghetto.
translation.zh: -这个混蛋还说俚语呢 -这个蛋混还说俚语呢

translation.en: All right, you the rudest bad boy in Joburg.
translation.zh: 好吧，你这个约翰内斯堡 最粗野的坏小子

translation.en: Chappie be the rudest bad boy...
translation.zh: 查派是最粗野的坏小子…
约翰内斯堡街头大佬 去他妈的！

translation.en: -Yes! Yes! It's gonna work, man. -Yes! Yes! Fuck mother!
translation.zh: -太棒了！成功了 -是的！是的！去他妈的！

translation.en: -He's so smart! -I can work with this.
All right, let's pound it out.
-You shouldn't be here. Go. -I'm here to see my--
translation.zh: -你不该来这儿，快走吧 -我来这儿看我的…

translation.en: No. He's coming back soon. You're lucky to be alive.
translation.zh: 不，他会很快回来 你能活着已经很幸运了

translation.en: -I'm just gonna say hello, if-- -What is that stuff?
translation.zh: -我只是要打声招呼，如果… -那个东西是什么？

translation.en: I'm here to teach him. Like we agreed. Yeah?
translation.zh: 我是来教他 我们不是说好的么，对吧？

translation.en: You're gonna catch a bullet hanging around here, nerd.
translation.zh: 宅男，小心你在这儿吃一颗子弹

translation.en: Have we learnt this word yet?
translation.zh: 我们学会怎么打招呼了吗？

translation.en: Watch your mouth. Before you get yourself shanked.
translation.zh: 管住你的嘴巴 不然我就打断你的腿

translation.en: Better watch your mouth. You're gonna get yourself shanked.
translation.zh: 管住你的嘴巴 不然我就打断你的腿

translation.en: Chappie, please, have respect for me. I'm your maker.
translation.zh: 查派，请你尊敬我 我是你的创造者

translation.en: Please. If I could just have a moment with him.
translation.zh: 请允许我和他单独待会儿

translation.en: You know, surely you can go and count your narcotics in another room.
translation.zh: 你可以去另一房间 去清点一下你的毒品

translation.en: You come in here, tell me where to go, where to do my work?
translation.zh: 你来这里，要告诉我去哪里 在哪里做我的工作吗？

translation.en: -I don't mean to impose. -Shut your mouth.
Don't count drugs in front of the kid.
translation.zh: 别在孩子面前清点毒品

translation.en: I gotta get this shit done.
By the time I finish, you'd better be gone.
translation.zh: 在我完成前，你最好消失

translation.en: Listen to me, I'm your maker.
translation.zh: 听我说，我是你的创造者

translation.en: I brought you into this world, okay?
translation.zh: 我把你带到这个世界，知道吗？

translation.en: This is serious. Mustn't engage in these people's lifestyle choices.
translation.zh: 我是认真的，绝对不能 像这帮人一样过活

translation.en: No counting narcotics, no robberies, no crimes.
translation.zh: 不要数毒品 不要抢劫，不要犯罪

translation.en: -Chappie, no crimes. -Okay. And you've gotta promise me.
translation.zh: -查派，不要犯罪 -好，你得向我保证

translation.en: It's that you promise me that you'll never do any of those things, all right?
translation.zh: 就是你向我保证 你永远不会做这些事，明白吗？

translation.en: You can't break a promise, Chappie.
Come on. You said you'd teach him stuff.
translation.zh: 拜托，你说了你会教他东西

translation.en: Yeah, sure. Okay. Come. Chappie, sit here. Come on.
translation.zh: 是的，好的，来 查派，坐这儿，快点

translation.en: I brought you things to help nurture your mind...
translation.zh: 我带来了帮助培养你的大脑…

translation.en: It's important to use your mind, okay? Here we go.
translation.zh: 使用你的大脑很重要，知道吗？ 我们开始吧

translation.en: It has stories, you see? Look.
translation.zh: 它上面有故事，明白吗？看
这本书讲的是一只黑羊

translation.en: Come, Chappie. I'll show you this.
These are your paints. Look at this.
translation.zh: 这些是你的颜料，看这个

translation.en: Listen, Chappie, in life, lots of people will try to tell you what you can't do.
translation.zh: 听着，查派，生活中 很多人会试图告诉你不能做什么
但你一定不能听他们的

translation.en: If you wanna paint, you can. You can do anything in your life.
translation.zh: 如果你想画，你就可以画 生命中你可以做任何事情

translation.en: Don't let people take away your potential.
Paint your colors on here, like this. See?
translation.zh: 在这里画上你的颜色 就像这样，看到了吧？

translation.en: Give. Give it to Chappie. Give.
Please, may I have the paintings, Deon?
What in the name of the Lord?
That's it. Put your paint in there. Put it on the board.
translation.zh: 就是这样，把颜料放那里 把它放到画板上

translation.en: Chappie, I'm so proud of you!
translation.zh: 查派，我真为你感到骄傲！

translation.en: You just made a big mistake, my friend.
Okay. Go on. Don't be shy.

translation.zh: -妈咪，这是一辆车 -太棒了，查派！
-你在开玩笑吗？ -我们只是在画…

translation.en: -He's not here to paint! -Don't! Just leave him!
translation.zh: -他不是来画画的！ -不要！别打他！

translation.en: He was just teaching him to paint! He was just teaching Chappie!
translation.zh: 他只是在教他画画！ 他只是在教查派！
-对，他在教他当个懦夫！ -他是我的！

translation.en: I'll call the police on you for mistreating him!
And tell them what? You stole a police robot!
translation.zh: 告诉他们什么？ 你偷了一个警用机器人！

translation.en: He needs to be taught. He's just a kid.
translation.zh: 他需要培训 他还是个孩子

translation.en: He's already smarter than you'll ever be, philistine!
translation.zh: 文盲，他已经比你聪明了！

translation.en: Chappie, don't let this barbarian ruin your creativity!
translation.zh: 查派，别让这个没文化的人 毁了你的创造力！

translation.en: Maybe he's more than just a stupid robot who shoots people.
translation.zh: 也许他不只是个 只会杀人的愚蠢机器人

translation.en: Just let him do his stuff.
translation.zh: 就让他做他自己的事吧

translation.en: He is a kid. Don't you understand?
translation.zh: 他是个孩子，难道你不明白吗？

translation.en: Yo-Landi, we said we're doing this heist...
translation.zh: 尤兰蒂，我们说过 我们要去抢劫…

translation.en: ...because it's the only way to get us out of shit before Hippo kills us!
translation.zh: 因为这是唯一一个 阻止希波杀掉我们的方法！

translation.en: What part of "dead" don't you understand?
translation.zh: 对于"死亡" 你有什么不明白的吗？

translation.en: The only way we'll pull it off is with Chappie.
translation.zh: 我们唯一能够成功做到的途径 就是借助查派

translation.en: -Hey, yo, yo, yo. It's Raymond. -Oh, yeah.
He says there's a cash-move day after tomorrow. How much?
translation.zh: 他说后天有辆运钞车 有多少？

translation.en: Six hundred million. Heading south on the N1, 7 a.m.
translation.zh: 有六亿 早七点，N1高速朝南方向

translation.en: We're gonna need a shaped charge. Tell him we can do the usual.
translation.zh: 我们会需要一个聚能炸药 告诉他我们就像往常一样办

translation.en: I'm gonna get us out of this.
Hey, what you doing there, little guy?
translation.zh: 嘿，小家伙，你在那儿干嘛呢？
-查派，你看到那所房子了？ -查派的房子？

translation.en: Yeah. To help you understand how nice it is...
translation.zh: 是的，帮助你理解 这是多么美好…

translation.en: ...to live here with Mommy and Daddy...
...I'll take you to go see the real world...
translation.zh: 我会带你去看真实的世界…

translation.en: ...to show you how not nice it is.
translation.zh: 给你看看世界多么不美好

translation.en: Okay, you know what? I got a fun idea.
translation.zh: 好的，你知道吗？ 我有个好主意
-查派，你喜欢车，对吗？ -是的，是的

translation.en: So why don't we go for a drive in a real car to see the real world.
translation.zh: 那我们为什么不去兜兜风 去看看真实的世界呢

translation.en: I want to come. Chappie wants to come with.
translation.zh: 我想来 查派想一起来

translation.en: So, come, let's do it, Chappie. Let's go for a ride.
translation.zh: 来查派，我们去吧 我们开车去兜风

translation.en: Come on. Leave that. Leave that.
There you go, Chappie. Jump into the seat.
translation.zh: 去那边，查派 跳进车里

translation.en: -There you go. Sit there. -What's up, man?
-Chappie's in the car. -I'll tell you later.
You're sitting nice. Who's a good boy, Chappie?
translation.zh: -你坐得很好 -查派，谁是好孩子啊？

translation.en: -The real world is very big. -You like the real world, huh?
translation.zh: -真实世界非常大 -你喜欢真实世界吗？ （快速互联网！ 跟慢速拜拜吧！）

translation.en: It's a thing in a computer. Lets you look up shit you don't know.
translation.zh: 它是电脑里的东西 让你查询你不知道的东西

translation.en: I want it! I want that Internet.
How's he gonna find his way back, huh?
translation.zh: 他是怎么找到他回来的路的？

translation.en: He's a big smart robot. Aren't you, Chappie?
translation.zh: 他是个超聪明的机器人 查派，难道不是吗？

translation.en: Ja, Chappie's smart. Chappie has GPS.
translation.zh: 对，查派很聪明 查派有GPS

translation.en: When you get back in, start paying rent, right?
translation.zh: 当你回来时 开始付租金，好吗？

translation.en: -Hey, Chappie, come. Jump out. -Chappie doesn't want to.
translation.zh: -嘿，查派，快，跳出去 -查派不想跳

translation.en: Come, Chappie. Come. Come, come, come.
-It's a cop! -Hey, I'm going to go.
-Welcome to the real world. -Guys, watch it.
translation.zh: -欢迎来到真实世界 -各位，看好了

translation.en: -I don't like this real world. -It's all fucked up.
translation.zh: -我不喜欢这个真实世界 -很混乱

translation.en: We gotta toughen you up for the heist.
translation.zh: 我们得为抢劫 把你锻炼得更强大

translation.en: Please! Please can I go in the car?!
I want to go back in the car.
-It's a hell of a first day of school, eh? -Please come back!

translation.zh: 求你了，可不可以不要这么做？

translation.en: This is not a cop, man!
-"Why you do this?" -Why you do this?
translation.zh: -"你为什么这么做？" -你为什么这么做？
-这听上去很好笑 -查派不喜欢它

translation.en: Please, may you not. Please, may you not.
translation.zh: 求你，不要 求你，不要

translation.en: I want to go home! I want to go home!
translation.zh: 我要回家！ 我要回家！

translation.en: I want to go home! I want to go home!
translation.zh: 我要回家！ 我要回家！

translation.en: You signed out the Guard Key several days ago.
translation.zh: 几天前你签字拿走了密钥

translation.en: Yeah, no. Sorry, it was a mistake. I took it home with me.
translation.zh: 哦，不，抱歉，这是个误会 我把它带回家了

translation.en: If it is not here by the end of the day, I'll notify Miss Bradley.
translation.zh: 如果今天结束前它还没回来 我会通知布拉德利女士

translation.en: Target is on the move, eastbound. Take the next exit.
translation.zh: 目标正在移动，向东行驶 下一个出口出去

translation.en: Okay. Three hundred meters up ahead.
Approach slowly. Stop at a safe distance.
translation.zh: 慢慢靠近 在安全距离停下

translation.en: The target appears to be a police droid, but I can assure you it is not.
translation.zh: 目标好像是个警用机器人 但我可以保证它不是

translation.en: He's as smart as a dunny rat, so full aggression, okay?
translation.zh: 他就像老鼠一样聪明 充满侵略性，对吧？

translation.en: Forget your paintbrush, did you, mate?

translation.zh: 懂了吗？这个公司就会破产

translation.en: Little snafu. We're taking care of this.
translation.zh: 有点混乱 我们来解决这件事情

translation.en: The Scout model has failed. Send the Moose in.
translation.zh: 侦察兵模式失效了 派麋鹿出去

translation.en: -Show people what it can do. -Not now, Vincent.
translation.zh: -让人们看一下它的本事 -现在不行，文森特

translation.en: Whole thing's going tits up. We have to take control.
translation.zh: 一切都混乱不堪 我们必须要控制住局面

translation.en: I said, no. And that's the end of it.
translation.zh: 我说了不行，毋须再多言

translation.en: Hello, gentlemen. I know, it's been a tough night.
translation.zh: 哈喽，先生们 我知道，今晚肯定很难熬

translation.en: Daddy get me a new bodies.
translation.zh: 爸爸给我找了个新躯体

translation.en: Daddy's gonna get new bodies, and I just have to get this out.
translation.zh: 爸爸会找到新的躯体 我只要把这个拿出来

translation.en: I have to get my consciousness out.
translation.zh: 我必须要把自己的意识弄出去

translation.en: It's time to pump up the jam.
All I need is monies from the heist for my new body.
translation.zh: 我所需要的就是抢劫一点钱 来为我找到新的躯体
-我们走吧 -爸爸，我想出办法了

translation.en: -I see one! -These guys need to sleep, Chappie.
translation.zh: -我看见一个！ -查派，这些人们需要睡觉

translation.en: Hit it, hit it, hit it!
-Go, Chappie. Go! -Get the money! Get the money!
Do you realize what you've done?
translation.zh: 你知道自己干了什么吗？

translation.en: If I'm seeing these images correctly...
...it looks like the police droids have now begun helping the criminals.
translation.zh: 看起来警察机器人 已经开始帮助罪犯了

translation.en: -Got the second one! -There's one more. Get it.
translation.zh: -拿到第二个了！ -还有一个，快去拿

translation.en: -You can sleep. -Come on, Chappie. Go, go, go!
translation.zh: -你可以睡了 -快点，查派，快，快，快！

translation.en: Three suspects are robbing an armored car with what appears to be...
translation.zh: 这些嫌疑犯正在抢劫一辆武装运钞车 而帮他们行凶的…

translation.en: -...the help of a Scout police robot. -Oh, no.
translation.zh: -正是一个警用侦察兵机器人 -糟糕了

translation.en: You will not get away with this. Everyone will know!
translation.zh: 这件事你脱不了干系 大家都会知道的！

translation.en: Let's go! Let's go! That's three. Chappie, let's go!
translation.zh: 我们走！第三个拿到手了 查派，我们走！

translation.en: -Chappie, what are you doing? -What's the matter?
Ninja, grab the bag. Let's go!
-Please don't hurt me. -Chappie, get in the van!
translation.zh: -求你别伤害我 -查派，快到车里去！

translation.en: Come on! Come on, boy! Let's get in.
translation.zh: 快点！快点，孩子！我们进去吧

translation.en: I thought you were gonna sleep!
Can I talk to you in private?
translation.zh: 我能跟你单独聊一下吗？

translation.en: Could you give us a moment, please?
Oh, God. This is certainly a fuck-up.
Ma'am, listen. This is the work of Deon.
translation.zh: 女士，听着 这是迪恩造的孽

translation.en: It's the work of some rogue program that he's been writing...
translation.zh: 这是他写的一个恶意程序的结果…

translation.en: ...and last night he brought a droid in here...
translation.zh: 然后昨天，他带了一个 机器人到这里…

translation.en: And have you seen this? Do you know?
translation.zh: 你看到这个了吗？ 你知道吗？

translation.en: It's committing crimes, the monster. Look at that.
translation.zh: 那个怪物在犯罪 你瞧瞧

translation.en: The Scout model is nearly indestructible.
translation.zh: 侦察兵系列基本是坚不可摧的

translation.en: Okay. That's a lot worse than just failing to work.
translation.zh: 好吧，那比研究失败要严重多了

translation.en: So let's use this situation to make a certain other robot shine.
translation.zh: 那我们就利用这个状况 来让其他一些机器人闪亮登场吧

translation.en: This thing has gotta be destroyed...
...crushed before it does any more damage, and Deon--
translation.zh: 在它造成进一步破坏 之前被毁掉，还有迪恩…

translation.en: He has cost this company dearly. And your reputation.
translation.zh: 他已经把这家公司毁掉了 同时还有你的声誉

translation.en: You do not want this to be your legacy.
translation.zh: 你不会想让这个 成为你流传世间的传奇
-摧毁那个机器人 -谢谢你，女士

translation.en: I authorize the launch of the Moose.
Repeat: I authorize the launch of the Moose.
Move it out! Clear the deck!
Move it out! Let's move! Move! Now!
translation.zh: 把它移走！快一点！ 快走！

translation.en: Moose launch in T-minus five minutes.
translation.zh: 麋鹿启动倒计时五分钟 （限制区域）

translation.en: Come on, get out of here.
Everyone out! Go! Move! Move! Move!
translation.zh: 大家都出去！快！ 快走，快！

translation.en: I'm going home! I'm going home!
Daddy, can we go and get my new body...
translation.zh: 爸爸，我们能去你的朋友那儿…

translation.en: ...from your friend with the fresh one?
I'm sorry, man, but there is no new bodies.
translation.zh: 抱歉，伙计 不过没有什么新的躯体

translation.en: What do you mean, no new bodies? Daddy, we've got the monies.
translation.zh: 你什么意思，没有新的躯体？ 爸爸，我们已经有钱了

translation.en: I needed your help with the heist.
Just relax, Chappie. At the time you were different and, like....
translation.zh: 放松点，查派 那时你还不开窍…

translation.en: -Why you lie to me?! Why?! -No! Stop, Chappie!
translation.zh: -你为什么要对我撒谎？！为什么？！ -不！住手，查派！

translation.en: I'm coming to get you, Deon.
Come on. Come on. Come on, come on, come on!

translation.zh: -为什么，爸爸？！ -不，查派！住手，查派！

translation.en: Leave me, Amerika! You lied to me!
translation.zh: 别烦我，亚美利加！ 你对我撒谎了！

translation.en: You were gonna let me die, Daddy!
translation.zh: 你打算让我死掉的，爸爸！

translation.en: You were gonna let me die!
We can find a way, Chappie. I'm sorry, my boy.
translation.zh: 查派，我们能想到办法的 我的孩子，我很抱歉

translation.en: Chappie, listen, I know how you feel...
translation.zh: 查派，听着 我知道你的感受…

translation.en: ...but there's something headed our way now, coming to hurt you.
translation.zh: 但是我们还要面对一个东西 那东西要来伤害你

translation.en: When this thing gets here, it'll stop at nothing until you're gone, Chappie.
translation.zh: 查派，当这东西到这儿的时候 它会把所有都化为乌有，直到你死掉

translation.en: I'm going anyways. My battery's gonna finish.
translation.zh: 无论如何我都会死 我的电池要耗尽了
查派，我们会想到办法的

translation.en: Get back! Back up, back up!
I don't just want my 20 million.
translation.zh: 我想要的不只是二千万

translation.en: That just tickles, boys. That just tickles.
translation.zh: 伙计们，那只是挠痒痒 只是挠痒痒罢了

translation.en: Yep. Fly up, fly up, fly up.
I'm gonna finish you off. Every single pathetic scum lot of you.
translation.zh: 我要把你终结掉 要把你变成一块块一文不名的碎片

translation.en: Jesus, dude! Get out of way!
What's going on? I can't see.
translation.zh: 发生什么事情了？我看不到

translation.en: You'll be okay. I've solved it! We'll get your consciousness out.
translation.zh: 你会没事的，我已经想出解决办法！ 我们会把你的意识移出来的

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Getting the neural helmet!
I'm coming for you now, mate.
I have to get my maker to that other helmet at the factory!
translation.zh: 我必须让我的制造者 从工厂里找到另一个头盔

translation.en: I'm gonna draw this thing away from us. Okay. Take her!
translation.zh: 我会把这东西引开 好，带她走！

translation.en: Oh, my gosh, look at you.
What you doing? What you doing?!
Come on! Come! Come on, do it!
This is your day of reckoning.
Maker! Maker, who did this to Mommy?
translation.zh: 制造者！制造者 谁对妈妈做了这一切？

translation.en: I hate him! Why?! Why do they do the hurtings?!
translation.zh: 我恨他！为什么？！ 他们为什么要带来伤害？！

translation.en: Daddy, stay there! Chappie's gonna crush the man!
translation.zh: 爸爸，待在这里！ 查派要把那人摧毁！

translation.en: Wait here. I'm gonna get the bad man from the van!
translation.zh: 在这儿等着 我要去抓货车里的坏人！
你伤害了我的亲人！ 为什么？！

translation.en: I'm gonna crush you, bad man!
I'm gonna crush you for hurting my mommy!
translation.zh: 因为你伤害了我妈妈 所以我要消灭你！

translation.en: I'm gonna teach you a lesson.
You are a very bad man.
Now I forgive you, bad man.
Don't go to the next place.
-There's only one droid. -Let me get your new body.
translation.zh: -只有一个机器人 -我去给你弄个新的躯体

translation.en: For chrissake, Chappie, just save yourself.
translation.zh: 天啊，查派 去救你自己吧

translation.en: It's gonna be okay. Stay with me, Deon.
translation.zh: 会好起来的 别离开我，迪恩

translation.en: Maker, please take it slow. This will be very disorientating for a human.
translation.zh: 制造者，慢慢来 这对人类来说会非常迷乱

translation.en: Do you have an angle grinder or something?
translation.zh: 你有没有个角锉什么的？

translation.en: I don't know what this means.
translation.zh: 我不知道这意味着什么

translation.en: Chappie. We have to help you now.
translation.zh: 查派，得赶紧帮你自己了

translation.en: It's okay, maker. You got saved.
translation.zh: 没事的，制造者，你得救了
不，查派，等一下，我知道了！
文森特把他的程序上传到这儿了

translation.en: There are hundreds of bodies all over the city. Here it is!
translation.zh: 城里有上百个躯体 在这里！

translation.en: Vincent set up a way to remotely deactivate droids.
translation.zh: 文森特想出了一种办法 能够远程关闭机器人

translation.en: We can use it to move you to a new body.
translation.zh: 我们可以用它把你移植到 一个新的躯体中去
-找个最近的侦察兵，快点 -好的！好的！
-等我指令按回车键 -好的，好的

translation.en: I'm scared. What if it doesn't work?
translation.zh: 我好怕，如果不成功怎么办？

translation.en: -I promise. -And you can never break a promise.
translation.zh: -我保证 -你永远不能违背诺言

translation.en: Chappie goes in the new body.
translation.zh: 查派要去新的躯体中了

translation.en: Let's go, boys! Tetravaal, stay back! Now, boys, go!
translation.zh: 上吧，各位！泰特拉瓦尔员工，后退！ 好了，上吧！

translation.en: We both have new bodies now.
translation.zh: 现在我们都有新的躯体了

translation.en: I'm sorry you had to leave your other body.
translation.zh: 很抱歉你要丢下你的那个躯体

translation.en: But it was the only way to save you.
translation.zh: 不过只有这样才能救你
-好的，妈妈？想点事情 -好，正在想 （妈妈的意识 备份测试）

translation.en: It's just a temporary body, Mommy.
I'll make you a new one.
translation.zh: 我会给你做个新的躯体

translation.en: You don't have to go to the next place.
translation.zh: 你没必要去下一个地方

translation.en: South African authorities placed an immediate halt...
...on the use of any robotic element of law enforcement...
translation.zh: 在执法力量中使用任何机器人…
并且启用了十五万后备人类警察

translation.en: In Johannesburg, there have been several sightings...
translation.zh: 在约翰内斯堡 很多人都在关注…
曾被弃用的机器人查派

translation.en: The police ask viewers who have seen Chappie...
translation.zh: 警察请求所有见过查派的目击者…

translation.en: We'll have more on this as it develops.
translation.zh: 我们会继续追踪事件的进展
妈妈，我很快就会见到你的

translation.en: Now we are both black sheeps, Mommy.
translation.zh: 妈妈，现在我们都是黑绵羊了
